a.title: Winter Fun at Mary Welsh Elementary

img.alt: Winter Fun at Mary Welsh Elementary

span.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);
span.span: Due to the latest information from Governor Reynolds,

br.span: WCSD will cancel school and activities until further notice.
We will continue to update you with information to help support our students and families.
Please continue to take care of yourselves!

span.span: The Williamsburg Community School District enjoys a history deep in tradition. The 2019-20 school year will mark the 134th year of consecutive public school education under the name of Williamsburg Community School District. It's a

community that brings families and educators together to create an environment of life long learning, achievement, and excellence. WCSD is a community where academics, the fine arts, and athletics are all highly valued and vigorously supported.

br.em: It's Great to Be a Raider!!!
